properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 3 at 2:54PM EST until January 6 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 1 PM EST /noon
CST/ Sunday to 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ Monday.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph.

* TIMING...Sunday afternoon into Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and high waves will cause minor beach
erosion and coastal flooding along the immediate lake shore.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ MONDAY
